reviewText: First off I must say I love the Secrets of the Dead series. I had not seen this episode so I bought it here.  Everything thing about the episode is well produced. It is only the Fact that the whole episode is so completely a Pro Scott fabrication told from a weather theorist prospective is the only reason this is a 4 star review and not a 5 star. Just about every author of anything pertaining to Antarctic exploration has a theory about Scott's demise. Here is another one.
